name: Bee Movie Game
summary: Bee Movie offers a one-of-a-kind experience as you play from the perspective of a bee. Race cars, chase targets, fly at high speed and more. As Barry B. Benson, you are on a journey to save the bee's production of honey that takes you to New York City and beyond. Master the hustle of the hive and venture outside the hive to navigate the hazards and excitement of the outside world.
